column5: I have seen on the Contol Board website that the lake level is rising fast and they are increasing outflow heavily. How is the lake level and will it continue to rise? 14 days and I will be on The Woods.

Just left there this morning. Lake was approx 1 1/2 ft low when we got there last week but appears to have risen in the past 2 days to near normal level & still rising. Lots of rain the past two days & still raining when we left. Forecast for the next week showed little to no rain but you know how the weatherman can sometimes be wrong haha! Good luck on your trip, we had a great one!!!
Thanks for the info. Glad you had a good trip.
